contentList.content: You regain all your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="WarPriestActionPoint">War Priest Charges</LSTag> after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
Say a prayer to regain one expended <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. The level can be up to half of your highest known spell slot level (rounded up).
